entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @thehill Somebody tell Trump to ask a WH staff person to check video feed of his many statements regarding any aspect of COVID19 so he can hear himself say the litany of lies, deflections, misinformation, and blaming of others.  This is another excuse.  Not my president.  Voting Blue
